name: domainsearch
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tomba.
Tool description: Search or verify lists of email addresses in seconds
API description: You can use this endpoint to show different browser icons to your users. The code argument receives the browser code as it appears in your user /account/sessions endpoint. Use width, height and quality arguments to change the output settings.

domain.description: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses. For example, \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"stripe.com\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"

department.description: Get only email addresses for people working in the selected department. Default is 'pr'.

page.description: Specifies the number of email addresses to skip by page number. Default is 1.
